Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison was standing alone and at a considerable distance away from other world leaders at the G7 meeting.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a single image and does not provide any additional evidence or context.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image accurately represents the situation at the G7 meeting without considering the possibility of editing or manipulation.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the image was originally posted as satire by a satirical group and was later edited.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image was edited and not an accurate representation of the actual situation at the G7 meeting.
